result.execSummary:
Brandon M Melton was extradited to another county, state or jurisdiction. Extradition means Brandon M Melton was accused or convicted of an offense in another county, state or jurisdiction and was taken there to face their charge(s) or conviction.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Brandon M Melton

defendant.name: Melton, Brandon M
defendant.address: 11322 West National Avenue,205, West Allis, WI 53227

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Brandon M Melton not in court.  Karine O'Byrne appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant has been turned over to the State of ILLINOIS on 1.11.2022
On motion of the state, Court ordered case closed.

Defendant Brandon M Melton in court with attorney Fred Richardson.  Defendant Brandon M Melton in custody.  Brad Alan Vorpahl appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Brandon M Melton appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Sanders, Branch 28.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of rights and right to file a Writ of Habeas Corpus.  Court found the defendant is the person wanted in the State of Illinois.  Defendant waived extradition.  Signed Waiver of Extradition received and filed.  Court ordered the defendant REMANDED into the custody of the Milwaukee County Sheriff's Department.  Status conference scheduled for January 28, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
